item.title: Lenovo, Ubuntu Upgrade, and the Backport Iwlwifi Dkms Package
item.description: Had an issue with getting MOK to install my keys for my Intel Corporation Wi-Fi 6 AX200 (rev 1a) wireless card on my Lenovo X1 Carbon Extreme G2.. Turns out there is a bug in the shell script that installs the self signed keys in to MOX… Which is great. But it turns out I have hit a bug.. Perhaps this is because I use zsh or somee other reason but.
